sentences.en: a book on modern English usage
sentences.cn: 关于现代英语用法的书

sentences.en: All photocopying machines need careful usage, and regular cleaning and maintenance.
sentences.cn: 所有照像复制机都需要小心使用 、 定期擦洗和维修.

sentences.en: He was a stickler for the correct usage of English.
sentences.cn: 他非常注重英语的正确使用。

sentences.en: I am clear about the usage of this word at last.
sentences.cn: 这个词的用法我算是弄明白了.

sentences.en: In communications, a point of data usage in a network.
sentences.cn: 在通信技术中, 网络中使用数据的地点.

sentences.en: Machines soon wear out under rough usage.
sentences.cn: 机器如果使用不仔细,很快就会磨损.

sentences.en: Parts of the motor wore out because of constant usage.
sentences.cn: 发动机的一些部件因为经常使用而磨损了。

sentences.en: She lays a lot of emphasis on the usage of prepositions.
sentences.cn: 她把重点放在介词的使用上.

sentences.en: That is typical usage for an application, but not for user data.
sentences.cn: 那是程序的典型用法, 但是对于用户数据来说不是这样的.

sentences.en: That phrase has come into usage.
sentences.cn: 那个短语已为大家所惯用.

sentences.en: The corners are somewhat smashed and broken by long, rough usage.
sentences.cn: 由于天长日久和不爱惜地使用,四个角都有些磨损,撞破了.

sentences.en: The usage is now firmly established.
sentences.cn: 这种用法现已得到确认.

sentences.en: The word "undertaker" had long been in common usage.
The wrong pronunciation of the word is sanctioned by public usage.
sentences.cn: 人们接受了这个字的错误读法,因为大家都这样念.

sentences.en: The wrong use of the word is sanctioned by usage.
sentences.cn: 这词的误用已约定俗成了.

sentences.en: This type of construction has greatly prospered in recent British usage.
sentences.cn: 这种结构最近已经在英国大为流行.

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的

phrases.tran_cn: 贸易惯例，贸易习惯；商业习惯
使用时间；通信传输时间

trans.tran_en: the way that words are used in a language
